name: Highway Racing 3D - Real Car Driver
description:
Never drive at fast speed in real world? Now it’s your chance to feel the passion and real speed in your hands with Highway Racing 3D!

Highway Racing 3D is the most thrilling, super charged action pace car simulator for car racing lovers to burn rubber and race for king of speed! This car racing simulation is the ultimate drag race on asphalt streets, featuring numerous world class sports cars, tons of missions to complete, stunning optimized graphics, immersing gameplay, intense Nitro booster and realistic traffic condition!

Highway Racing 3D is a true-to-life racing game, which you can experience real high-speed driving and furiously collision while driving a bunch of luxury cars to battle top racers. If you are a big fan of arcade racing fan, you won’t miss the exciting and challenging Traffic Racer Simulator!

Get ready to drive high performance at high speed in specially designed tracks for car racing? Now grip the wheel and push your ride to it’s limit, put your foot to the floor and drive!


Highway Racing 3D features
-super charged action pace car racing simulation
-most realistic and challenging driving simulator
-intuitive and sensitive on-screen touch control
-full customize vehicles options with hard earned money
-choose different setups for each car: racing, turbo
-racing on specially designed tracks
-insane feeling of powerful sports car
-Nitro Booster for super-speed road racing
-FREE game

Evolve your ride and push it to it’s limit to compete donuts like a champion!
